BreadcrumbHomeNPDES Permits Around the NationMissouri NPDES PermitsThe state of Missouri does not have tribal lands. EPA issues NPDES permits for all biosolids processing facilities in Missouri, which are shown in the table below.EPA has delegated authority to the Missouri Department of Natural Resources (MoDNR) to issue all NPDES permits statewide, except those for biosolids processing facilities. NPDES permits issued by the state of Missouri are available onMoDNR's Wastewater Permits website.Click on the facility/permit name to view the permit.NPDES Permits issued by EPA in MissouriCountyTribeFacility or Permit NameFacility TypePermit NumberEffective DateExpiration DateSt. LouisN/ASt. Louis Biosolids Composting NPDES Permit  (pdf)(2.36 MB)BiosolidsMO001389092018/05/232018/05/22Contact Us About NPDES Permits Around the Nationto ask a question, provide feedback, or report a problem.Last updated on December 10, 2024
